title.zh: 《齊太公世家》 House of Duke Tai of Qi
title.raw: 《齊太公世家》 House of Duke Tai of Qi

sentences.zh: 太公望呂尚者，東海上人。

translations.text: Tai Gong Wang Lu Shang, eastern sea person.

sentences.zh: 其先祖嘗為四嶽，佐禹平水土甚有功。

translations.text: His ancestors once served as Four Peaks, assisted Yu control floodwaters greatly meritorious.

sentences.zh: 虞夏之際封於呂，或封於申，姓姜氏。

translations.text: Yu Xia time enfeoffed at Lu, or enfeoffed at Shen, surname Jiang.

sentences.zh: 夏商之時，申、呂或封枝庶子孫，或為庶人，尚其後苗裔也。

translations.text: Xia Shang time, Shen Lu or enfeoffed branch collateral descendants, or became commoners, Shang their later descendants.

sentences.zh: 本姓姜氏，從其封姓，故曰呂尚。

translations.text: Originally surname Jiang, followed his fief surname, so called Lu Shang.

Tai Gong Wang Lu Shang, eastern sea person. His ancestors once served as Four Peaks, assisted Yu control floodwaters greatly meritorious. Yu Xia time enfeoffed at Lu, or enfeoffed at Shen, surname Jiang. Xia Shang time, Shen Lu or enfeoffed branch collateral descendants, or became commoners, Shang their later descendants. Originally surname Jiang, followed his fief surname, so called Lu Shang.

sentences.zh: 呂尚蓋嘗窮困，年老矣，以漁釣奸周西伯。

translations.text: Lu Shang probably once poor, aged, used fishing hooks deceived Zhou Xi Bo.

sentences.zh: 西伯將出獵，卜之，曰「所獲非龍非彨非虎非羆；

translations.text: Xi Bo about to go hunting, divined, said 'what obtained not dragon not boar not tiger not bear;

sentences.zh: 所獲霸王之輔」。

translations.text: what obtained hegemon king's assistant'.

sentences.zh: 於是周西伯獵，果遇太公於渭之陽，與語大說，曰：「自吾先君太公曰『當有聖人適周，周以興』。

translations.text: Therefore Zhou Xi Bo hunted, indeed met Tai Gong at Wei's north, spoke greatly pleased, said: 'From my previous lord Tai Gong said 'should have sage adapt Zhou, Zhou uses rise'.

sentences.zh: 子真是邪？

translations.text: You truly this? My Tai Gong hoped you long.'

sentences.zh: 吾太公望子久矣。」

translations.text: Therefore titled him 'Tai Gong Wang', loaded with together returned, established as teacher.

sentences.zh: 故號之曰「太公望」，載與俱歸，立為師。

translations.text: Some say, Tai Gong broad knowledge, once served Zhou.

Lu Shang probably once poor, aged, used fishing hooks deceived Zhou Xi Bo. Xi Bo about to go hunting, divined, said 'what obtained not dragon not boar not tiger not bear; what obtained hegemon king's assistant'. Therefore Zhou Xi Bo hunted, indeed met Tai Gong at Wei's north, spoke greatly pleased, said: 'From my previous lord Tai Gong said 'should have sage adapt Zhou, Zhou uses rise'. You truly this? My Tai Gong hoped you long.' Therefore titled him 'Tai Gong Wang', loaded with together returned, established as teacher. Some say, Tai Gong broad knowledge, once served Zhou.

sentences.zh: 或曰，太公博聞，嘗事紂。

translations.text: Zhou no way, left him.

sentences.zh: 紂無道，去之。

translations.text: Traveled persuaded feudal lords, nowhere met, finally west returned Zhou Xi Bo.

sentences.zh: 游說諸侯，無所遇，而卒西歸周西伯。

translations.text: Some say, Lu Shang recluse, hidden seashore.

sentences.zh: 或曰，呂尚處士，隱海濱。

translations.text: Zhou Xi Bo imprisoned You Li, San Yi Sheng, Hong Tian originally knew and summoned Lu Shang.

sentences.zh: 周西伯拘羑里，散宜生、閎夭素知而招呂尚。

translations.text: Lu Shang also said 'I heard Xi Bo worthy, moreover good support elderly, why not go'.

sentences.zh: 呂尚亦曰「吾聞西伯賢，又善養老，盍往焉」。

translations.text: Three people for Xi Bo sought beautiful women rare objects, presented to Zhou to redeem Xi Bo.

sentences.zh: 三人者為西伯求美女奇物，獻之於紂，以贖西伯。

translations.text: Xi Bo able exit, returned country.

sentences.zh: 西伯得以出，反國。

translations.text: Speak Lu Shang so served Zhou though different, but main as Wen Wu teacher.

sentences.zh: 言呂尚所以事周雖異，然要之為文武師。

translations.text: Zhou Xi Bo Chang's escape You Li return, with Lu Shang secretly planned cultivate virtue to overthrow Shang government, his affairs many military authority and strange strategies, so later generations speak military and Zhou's hidden authority all take Tai Gong as fundamental plan.

Zhou no way, left him. Traveled persuaded feudal lords, nowhere met, finally west returned Zhou Xi Bo. Some say, Lu Shang recluse, hidden seashore. Zhou Xi Bo imprisoned You Li, San Yi Sheng, Hong Tian originally knew and summoned Lu Shang. Lu Shang also said 'I heard Xi Bo worthy, moreover good support elderly, why not go'. Three people for Xi Bo sought beautiful women rare objects, presented to Zhou to redeem Xi Bo. Xi Bo able exit, returned country. Speak Lu Shang so served Zhou though different, but main as Wen Wu teacher. Zhou Xi Bo Chang's escape You Li return, with Lu Shang secretly planned cultivate virtue to overthrow Shang government, his affairs many military authority and strange strategies, so later generations speak military and Zhou's hidden authority all take Tai Gong as fundamental plan.

sentences.zh: 周西伯昌之脫羑里歸，與呂尚陰謀修德以傾商政，其事多兵權與奇計，故後世之言兵及周之陰權皆宗太公為本謀。

translations.text: Zhou Xi Bo government peaceful, to adjudicating Yu Rui dispute, poets praised Xi Bo received mandate called Wen Wang.

sentences.zh: 周西伯政平，及斷虞芮之訟，而詩人稱西伯受命曰文王。

translations.text: Attacked Chong, Mi Xu, Quan Yi, greatly built Feng yi.

sentences.zh: 伐崇、密須、犬夷，大作豐邑。

translations.text: World three parts, its two belonged Zhou, Tai Gong's strategy planning most.

sentences.zh: 天下三分，其二歸周者，太公之謀計居多。

translations.text: Wen Wang collapsed, Wu Wang ascended throne.

Zhou Xi Bo government peaceful, to adjudicating Yu Rui dispute, poets praised Xi Bo received mandate called Wen Wang. Attacked Chong, Mi Xu, Quan Yi, greatly built Feng yi. World three parts, its two belonged Zhou, Tai Gong's strategy planning most. Wen Wang collapsed, Wu Wang ascended throne.

sentences.zh: 文王崩，武王即位。

translations.text: Nine years, wished repair Wen Wang enterprise, east attacked to observe feudal lords gathered or not.

sentences.zh: 九年，欲修文王業，東伐以觀諸侯集否。

translations.text: Troops marched, Shi Shang Fu left held yellow axe, right grasped white banner to swear, said: 'Blue rhinoceros blue rhinoceros, gather your multitudes, give you boats oars, later arrive behead!'

sentences.zh: 師行，師尚父左杖黃鉞，右把白旄以誓，曰：「蒼兕蒼兕，總爾眾庶，與爾舟楫，後至者斬！」

translations.text: Then arrived Meng Jin.

sentences.zh: 遂至盟津。

translations.text: Feudal lords not appointed but assembled eight hundred feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 諸侯不期而會者八百諸侯。

translations.text: Feudal lords all said: 'Zhou can attack.'

sentences.zh: 諸侯皆曰：「紂可伐也。」

translations.text: Wu Wang said: 'Not yet.'

sentences.zh: 武王曰：「未可。」

translations.text: Returned troops, with Tai Gong made this great oath.

sentences.zh: 還師，與太公作此太誓。

translations.text: Resided two years, Zhou killed Wang Zi Bi Gan, imprisoned Ji Zi.

Nine years, wished repair Wen Wang enterprise, east attacked to observe feudal lords gathered or not. Troops marched, Shi Shang Fu left held yellow axe, right grasped white banner to swear, said: 'Blue rhinoceros blue rhinoceros, gather your multitudes, give you boats oars, later arrive behead!' Then arrived Meng Jin. Feudal lords not appointed but assembled eight hundred feudal lords. Feudal lords all said: 'Zhou can attack.' Wu Wang said: 'Not yet.' Returned troops, with Tai Gong made this great oath. Resided two years, Zhou killed Wang Zi Bi Gan, imprisoned Ji Zi.

sentences.zh: 居二年，紂殺王子比干，囚箕子。

translations.text: Wu Wang about attack Zhou, divined tortoise omen, not auspicious, wind rain violently arrived.

sentences.zh: 武王將伐紂，卜龜兆，不吉，風雨暴至。

translations.text: Group nobles all feared, only Tai Gong strongly urged Wu Wang, Wu Wang then proceeded.

sentences.zh: 群公盡懼，唯太公彊之勸武王，武王於是遂行。

translations.text: Eleventh year first month Jia Zi, swore at Mu Ye, attacked Shang Zhou.

sentences.zh: 十一年正月甲子，誓於牧野，伐商紂。

translations.text: Zhou troops defeated routed.

sentences.zh: 紂師敗績。

translations.text: Zhou fled back, ascended Lu Tai, then pursued beheaded Zhou.

sentences.zh: 紂反走，登鹿臺，遂追斬紂。

translations.text: Next day, Wu Wang stood at altar, group nobles presented bright water, Wei Kang Shu spread cloth mats, Shi Shang Fu led sacrificial animal, Shi Yi wrote blessing, to inform spirits punish Zhou's crimes.

sentences.zh: 明日，武王立于社，群公奉明水，衛康叔封布采席，師尚父牽牲，史佚策祝，以告神討紂之罪。

translations.text: Distributed Lu Tai's money, opened Ju Qiao's grain, to relieve poor people.

sentences.zh: 散鹿臺之錢，發鉅橋之粟，以振貧民。

translations.text: Sealed Bi Gan tomb, released Ji Zi prisoner.

sentences.zh: 封比干墓，釋箕子囚。

translations.text: Moved nine tripods, repaired Zhou government, with world began anew.

sentences.zh: 遷九鼎，修周政，與天下更始。

translations.text: Shi Shang Fu planned most.

sentences.zh: 師尚父謀居多。

translations.text: Therefore Wu Wang already pacified Shang became king world, enfeoffed Shi Shang Fu at Qi Ying Qiu.

Wu Wang about attack Zhou, divined tortoise omen, not auspicious, wind rain violently arrived. Group nobles all feared, only Tai Gong strongly urged Wu Wang, Wu Wang then proceeded. Eleventh year first month Jia Zi, swore at Mu Ye, attacked Shang Zhou. Zhou troops defeated routed. Zhou fled back, ascended Lu Tai, then pursued beheaded Zhou. Next day, Wu Wang stood at altar, group nobles presented bright water, Wei Kang Shu spread cloth mats, Shi Shang Fu led sacrificial animal, Shi Yi wrote blessing, to inform spirits punish Zhou's crimes. Distributed Lu Tai's money, opened Ju Qiao's grain, to relieve poor people. Sealed Bi Gan tomb, released Ji Zi prisoner. Moved nine tripods, repaired Zhou government, with world began anew. Shi Shang Fu planned most. Therefore Wu Wang already pacified Shang became king world, enfeoffed Shi Shang Fu at Qi Ying Qiu.

sentences.zh: 於是武王已平商而王天下，封師尚父於齊營丘。

translations.text: East went to state, road stayed went slow.

sentences.zh: 東就國，道宿行遲。

translations.text: Inn people said: 'I heard opportunity hard get easy lose.

sentences.zh: 逆旅之人曰：「吾聞時難得而易失。

translations.text: Guest sleeps very peaceful, probably not go to state people.'

sentences.zh: 客寢甚安，殆非就國者也。」

translations.text: Tai Gong heard it, night clothed went, by dawn arrived state.

sentences.zh: 太公聞之，夜衣而行，犁明至國。

translations.text: Lu Shang arrived state, repaired government, followed their customs, simplified their rites, opened merchant artisan occupations, facilitated fish salt benefits, people many belonged Qi, Qi became great country.

sentences.zh: 萊侯來伐，與之爭營丘。
營丘邊萊。

translations.text: Ying Qiu bordered Lai.

sentences.zh: 萊人，夷也，會紂之亂而周初定，未能集遠方，是以與太公爭國。

translations.text: Lai people, Yi barbarians, met Zhou's chaos and Zhou initially settled, could not gather distant places, therefore with Tai Gong contended for state.

East went to state, road stayed went slow. Inn people said: 'I heard opportunity hard get easy lose. Guest sleeps very peaceful, probably not go to state people.' Tai Gong heard it, night clothed went, by dawn arrived state. Lu Shang arrived state, repaired government, followed their customs, simplified their rites, opened merchant artisan occupations, facilitated fish salt benefits, people many belonged Qi, Qi became great country. 及周成王少時，管蔡作亂，淮夷畔周，乃使召康公命太公曰：「東至海，西至河，南至穆陵，北至無棣，五侯九伯，實得征之。」 Ying Qiu bordered Lai. Lai people, Yi barbarians, met Zhou's chaos and Zhou initially settled, could not gather distant places, therefore with Tai Gong contended for state.

sentences.zh: 太公至國，修政，因其俗，簡其禮，通商工之業，便魚鹽之利，而人民多歸齊，齊為大國。

translations.text: Tai Gong arrived state, repaired government, followed their customs, simplified their rites, opened merchant artisan occupations, facilitated fish salt benefits, people many belonged Qi, Qi became great country.

sentences.zh: 及周成王少時，管蔡作亂，淮夷畔周，乃使召康公命太公曰：「東至海，西至河，南至穆陵，北至無棣，五侯九伯，實得征之。」

translations.text: When Zhou Cheng Wang young, Guan Cai made disorder, Huai Yi rebelled Zhou, then sent Shao Kang Gong commanded Tai Gong: 'East to sea, west to Yellow River, south to Mu Ling, north to Wu Di, five marquises nine earls, truly able attack them.'

sentences.zh: 齊由此得征伐，為大國。

translations.text: Qi from this able attack, became great country.

sentences.zh: 都營丘。

translations.text: Capital Ying Qiu.

Tai Gong arrived state, repaired government, followed their customs, simplified their rites, opened merchant artisan occupations, facilitated fish salt benefits, people many belonged Qi, Qi became great country. When Zhou Cheng Wang young, Guan Cai made disorder, Huai Yi rebelled Zhou, then sent Shao Kang Gong commanded Tai Gong: 'East to sea, west to Yellow River, south to Mu Ling, north to Wu Di, five marquises nine earls, truly able attack them.' Qi from this able attack, became great country. Capital Ying Qiu.

sentences.zh: 蓋太公之卒百有餘年，子丁公呂伋立。

translations.text: About Tai Gong's death over hundred years, son Ding Gong Lu Ji established.

sentences.zh: 丁公卒，子乙公得立。

translations.text: Ding Gong died, son Yi Gong De established.

sentences.zh: 乙公卒，子癸公慈母立。

translations.text: Yi Gong died, son Gui Gong Ci Mu established.

sentences.zh: 癸公卒，子哀公不辰立。

translations.text: Gui Gong died, son Ai Gong Bu Chen established.

About Tai Gong's death over hundred years, son Ding Gong Lu Ji established. Ding Gong died, son Yi Gong De established. Yi Gong died, son Gui Gong Ci Mu established. Gui Gong died, son Ai Gong Bu Chen established.

sentences.zh: 哀公時，紀侯譖之周，周烹哀公而立其弟靜，是為胡公。

translations.text: Ai Gong time, Ji Hou slandered him to Zhou, Zhou boiled Ai Gong established his younger brother Jing, this was Hu Gong.

sentences.zh: 胡公徙都薄泵，而當周夷王之時。

translations.text: Hu Gong moved capital Bo Zhuang, during Zhou Yi Wang time.
Ai Gong time, Ji Hou slandered him to Zhou, Zhou boiled Ai Gong established his younger brother Jing, this was Hu Gong. Hu Gong moved capital Bo Zhuang, during Zhou Yi Wang time.

sentences.zh: 哀公之同母少弟山怨胡公，乃與其黨率營丘人襲攻殺胡公而自立，是為獻公。

translations.text: Ai Gong's same mother younger brother Shan resented Hu Gong, then with his party led Ying Qiu people attacked killed Hu Gong self established, this was Xian Gong.

sentences.zh: 獻公元年，盡逐胡公子，因徙薄泵都，治臨菑。

translations.text: Xian Gong first year, completely drove out Hu Gong sons, because moved Bo Zhuang capital, governed Lin Zi.

Ai Gong's same mother younger brother Shan resented Hu Gong, then with his party led Ying Qiu people attacked killed Hu Gong self established, this was Xian Gong. Xian Gong first year, completely drove out Hu Gong sons, because moved Bo Zhuang capital, governed Lin Zi.

sentences.zh: 九年，獻公卒，子武公壽立。

translations.text: Nine years, Xian Gong died, son Wu Gong Shou established.

sentences.zh: 武公九年，周厲王出奔，居彘。

translations.text: Wu Gong nine years, Zhou Li Wang went fleeing, resided Zhu.

sentences.zh: 十年，王室亂，大臣行政，號曰「共和」。

translations.text: Tenth year, Wang chamber chaos, ministers administered government, called 'Republican'.

sentences.zh: 二十四年，周宣王初立。

translations.text: Twenty-four years, Zhou Xuan Wang initially established.

Nine years, Xian Gong died, son Wu Gong Shou established. Wu Gong nine years, Zhou Li Wang went fleeing, resided Zhu. Tenth year, Wang chamber chaos, ministers administered government, called 'Republican'. Twenty-four years, Zhou Xuan Wang initially established.

sentences.zh: 二十六年，武公卒，子厲公無忌立。

translations.text: Twenty-six years, Wu Gong died, son Li Gong Wu Ji established.

sentences.zh: 厲公暴虐，故胡公子復入齊，齊人欲立之，乃與攻殺厲公。

translations.text: Li Gong tyrannical cruel, so Hu Gong sons again entered Qi, Qi people wished establish him, then with attacked killed Li Gong.

sentences.zh: 胡公子亦戰死。

translations.text: Hu Gong son also battle died.

sentences.zh: 齊人乃立厲公子赤為君，是為文公，而誅殺厲公者七十人。

translations.text: Qi people then established Li Gong son Chi as lord, this was Wen Gong, executed killed Li Gong seventy people.

Twenty-six years, Wu Gong died, son Li Gong Wu Ji established. Li Gong tyrannical cruel, so Hu Gong sons again entered Qi, Qi people wished establish him, then with attacked killed Li Gong. Hu Gong son also battle died. Qi people then established Li Gong son Chi as lord, this was Wen Gong, executed killed Li Gong seventy people.

sentences.zh: 文公十二年卒，子成公脫立。

translations.text: Wen Gong twelve years died, son Cheng Gong Tuo established.

sentences.zh: 成公九年卒，子莊公購立。

translations.text: Cheng Gong nine years died, son Zhuang Gong Gou established.
Wen Gong twelve years died, son Cheng Gong Tuo established. Cheng Gong nine years died, son Zhuang Gong Gou established.

sentences.zh: 莊公二十四年，犬戎殺幽王，周東徙雒。

translations.text: Zhuang Gong twenty-four years, Quan Rong killed You Wang, Zhou east moved Luo.

sentences.zh: 秦始列為諸侯。

translations.text: Qin began ranked as feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 五十六年，晉弒其君昭侯。

translations.text: Fifty-six years, Jin assassinated their lord Zhao Hou.
Zhuang Gong twenty-four years, Quan Rong killed You Wang, Zhou east moved Luo. Qin began ranked as feudal lords. Fifty-six years, Jin assassinated their lord Zhao Hou.

sentences.zh: 六十四年，莊公卒，子釐公祿甫立。

translations.text: Sixty-four years, Zhuang Gong died, son Xi Gong Lu Fu established.
Sixty-four years, Zhuang Gong died, son Xi Gong Lu Fu established.

sentences.zh: 釐公九年，魯隱公初立。

translations.text: Xi Gong nine years, Lu Yin Gong initially established.

sentences.zh: 十九年，魯桓公弒其兄隱公而自立為君。

translations.text: Nineteen years, Lu Huan Gong assassinated his elder brother Yin Gong self established as lord.
Xi Gong nine years, Lu Yin Gong initially established. Nineteen years, Lu Huan Gong assassinated his elder brother Yin Gong self established as lord.

sentences.zh: 二十五年，北戎伐齊。

translations.text: Twenty-five years, northern Rong attacked Qi.

sentences.zh: 鄭使太子忽來救齊，齊欲妻之。

translations.text: Zheng sent crown prince Hu came save Qi, Qi wished marry him.

sentences.zh: 忽曰：「鄭小齊大，非我敵。」

translations.text: Hu said: 'Zheng small Qi large, not our match.'

sentences.zh: 遂辭之。

translations.text: Then declined it.
Twenty-five years, northern Rong attacked Qi. Zheng sent crown prince Hu came save Qi, Qi wished marry him. Hu said: 'Zheng small Qi large, not our match.' Then declined it.

sentences.zh: 三十二年，釐公同母弟夷仲年死。

translations.text: Thirty-two years, Xi Gong same mother younger brother Yi Zhong year died.

sentences.zh: 其子曰公孫無知，釐公愛之，令其秩服奉養比太子。

translations.text: His son called Gong Sun Wu Zhi, Xi Gong loved him, ordered his rank clothing support compare crown prince.
Thirty-two years, Xi Gong same mother younger brother Yi Zhong year died. His son called Gong Sun Wu Zhi, Xi Gong loved him, ordered his rank clothing support compare crown prince.

sentences.zh: 三十三年，釐公卒，太子諸兒立，是為襄公。

translations.text: Thirty-three years, Xi Gong died, crown prince Zhu Er established, this was Xiang Gong.
Thirty-three years, Xi Gong died, crown prince Zhu Er established, this was Xiang Gong.

sentences.zh: 襄公元年，始為太子時，嘗與無知鬬，及立，絀無知秩服，無知怨。

translations.text: Xiang Gong first year, began as crown prince time, once with Wu Zhi fought, to established, reduced Wu Zhi rank clothing, Wu Zhi resented.
Xiang Gong first year, began as crown prince time, once with Wu Zhi fought, to established, reduced Wu Zhi rank clothing, Wu Zhi resented.

sentences.zh: 四年，魯桓公與夫人如齊。

translations.text: Fourth year, Lu Huan Gong with wife went to Qi.

sentences.zh: 齊襄公故嘗私通魯夫人。

translations.text: Qi Xiang Gong originally once privately communicated Lu wife.

sentences.zh: 魯夫人者，襄公女弟也，自釐公時嫁為魯桓公婦，及桓公來而襄公復通焉。

translations.text: Lu wife was Xiang Gong younger sister, from Xi Gong time married as Lu Huan Gong wife, to Huan Gong came Xiang Gong again communicated her.

sentences.zh: 魯桓公知之，怒夫人，夫人以告齊襄公。

translations.text: Lu Huan Gong knew it, angered wife, wife informed Qi Xiang Gong.

sentences.zh: 齊襄公與魯君飲，醉之，使力士彭生抱上魯君車，因拉殺魯桓公，桓公下車則死矣。

translations.text: Qi Xiang Gong with Lu lord drank, intoxicated him, made strong man Peng Sheng embrace lift Lu lord onto carriage, then pulled killed Lu Huan Gong, Huan Gong descended carriage then died.

sentences.zh: 魯人以為讓，而齊襄公殺彭生以謝魯。

translations.text: Lu people considered it reproach, Qi Xiang Gong killed Peng Sheng to apologize Lu.

Fourth year, Lu Huan Gong with wife went to Qi. Qi Xiang Gong originally once privately communicated Lu wife. Lu wife was Xiang Gong younger sister, from Xi Gong time married as Lu Huan Gong wife, to Huan Gong came Xiang Gong again communicated her. Lu Huan Gong knew it, angered wife, wife informed Qi Xiang Gong. Qi Xiang Gong with Lu lord drank, intoxicated him, made strong man Peng Sheng embrace lift Lu lord onto carriage, then pulled killed Lu Huan Gong, Huan Gong descended carriage then died. Lu people considered it reproach, Qi Xiang Gong killed Peng Sheng to apologize Lu.

sentences.zh: 八年，伐紀，紀遷去其邑。

translations.text: Eighth year, attacked Ji, Ji moved left their city.
Eighth year, attacked Ji, Ji moved left their city.

sentences.zh: 十二年，初，襄公使連稱、管至父戍葵丘，瓜時而往，及瓜而代。

translations.text: Twelfth year, initially, Xiang Gong made Lian Cheng, Guan Zhi Fu garrison Kui Qiu, melon time went, to melon then replace.

sentences.zh: 往戍一歲，卒瓜時而公弗為發代。

translations.text: Went garrison one year, reached melon time but duke not sent replacement.

sentences.zh: 或為請代，公弗許。

translations.text: Someone requested replacement, duke not permitted.

sentences.zh: 故此二人怒，因公孫無知謀作亂。

translations.text: Therefore these two angered, through Gong Sun Wu Zhi planned make disorder.

sentences.zh: 連稱有從妹在公宮，無寵，使之閒襄公，曰「事成以女為無知夫人」。

translations.text: Lian Cheng had younger sister in duke palace, no favor, made her spy Xiang Gong, said 'affair succeeds make girl Wu Zhi wife'.

sentences.zh: 冬十二月，襄公游姑棼，遂獵沛丘。

translations.text: Winter twelfth month, Xiang Gong toured Gu Fen, then hunted Pei Qiu.

sentences.zh: 見彘，從者曰「彭生」。

translations.text: Saw pig, followers said 'Peng Sheng'.

sentences.zh: 公怒，射之，彘人立而啼。

translations.text: Duke angered, shot it, pig stood cried.

sentences.zh: 公懼，墜車傷足，失屨。

translations.text: Duke feared, fell from carriage injured foot, lost shoe.

sentences.zh: 反而鞭主屨者茀三百。

translations.text: Returned whipped chief shoe Fu three hundred.

sentences.zh: 茀出宮。

translations.text: Fu went out palace.

sentences.zh: 而無知、連稱、管至父等聞公傷，乃遂率其眾襲宮。

translations.text: Wu Zhi, Lian Cheng, Guan Zhi Fu etc. heard duke injured, then led their multitudes attacked palace.

sentences.zh: 逢主屨茀，茀曰：「且無入驚宮，驚宮未易入也。」

translations.text: Met chief shoe Fu, Fu said: 'Moreover do not enter alarm palace, alarm palace not easy enter.'

sentences.zh: 無知弗信，茀示之創，乃信之。

translations.text: Wu Zhi not believed, Fu showed his wound, then believed.

sentences.zh: 待宮外，令茀先入。

translations.text: Waited palace outside, ordered Fu first enter.

sentences.zh: 茀先入，即匿襄公戶閒。

translations.text: Fu first entered, immediately hid Xiang Gong door between.

sentences.zh: 良久，無知等恐，遂入宮。

translations.text: Long time, Wu Zhi etc. feared, then entered palace.

sentences.zh: 茀反與宮中及公之幸臣攻無知等，不勝，皆死。

translations.text: Fu returned with palace within and duke's favored ministers attacked Wu Zhi etc., not win, all died.

sentences.zh: 無知入宮，求公不得。

translations.text: Wu Zhi entered palace, sought duke not obtained.

sentences.zh: 或見人足於戶閒，發視，乃襄公，遂弒之，而無知自立為齊君。

translations.text: Someone saw person feet at door between, dug looked, was Xiang Gong, then assassinated him, Wu Zhi self established as Qi lord.

Twelfth year, initially, Xiang Gong made Lian Cheng, Guan Zhi Fu garrison Kui Qiu, melon time went, to melon then replace. Went garrison one year, reached melon time but duke not sent replacement. Someone requested replacement, duke not permitted. Therefore these two angered, through Gong Sun Wu Zhi planned make disorder. Lian Cheng had younger sister in duke palace, no favor, made her spy Xiang Gong, said 'affair succeeds make girl Wu Zhi wife'. Winter twelfth month, Xiang Gong toured Gu Fen, then hunted Pei Qiu. Saw pig, followers said 'Peng Sheng'. Duke angered, shot it, pig stood cried. Duke feared, fell from carriage injured foot, lost shoe. Returned whipped chief shoe Fu three hundred. Fu went out palace. Wu Zhi, Lian Cheng, Guan Zhi Fu etc. heard duke injured, then led their multitudes attacked palace. Met chief shoe Fu, Fu said: 'Moreover do not enter alarm palace, alarm palace not easy enter.' Wu Zhi not believed, Fu showed his wound, then believed. Waited palace outside, ordered Fu first enter. Fu first entered, immediately hid Xiang Gong door between. Long time, Wu Zhi etc. feared, then entered palace. Fu returned with palace within and duke's favored ministers attacked Wu Zhi etc., not win, all died. Wu Zhi entered palace, sought duke not obtained. Someone saw person feet at door between, dug looked, was Xiang Gong, then assassinated him, Wu Zhi self established as Qi lord.

sentences.zh: 桓公元年春，齊君無知游於雍林。

translations.text: Huan Gong first year spring, Qi lord Wu Zhi toured Yong Lin.

sentences.zh: 雍林人嘗有怨無知，及其往游，雍林人襲殺無知，告齊大夫曰：「無知弒襄公自立，臣謹行誅。

translations.text: Yong Lin person once had resentment Wu Zhi, to his going tour, Yong Lin person attacked killed Wu Zhi, informed Qi grand masters: 'Wu Zhi assassinated Xiang Gong self established, minister respectfully executed punishment.

sentences.zh: 唯大夫更立公子之當立者，唯命是聽。」

translations.text: Only grand masters moreover establish gong zi should establish, only command listen.'

Huan Gong first year spring, Qi lord Wu Zhi toured Yong Lin. Yong Lin person once had resentment Wu Zhi, to his going tour, Yong Lin person attacked killed Wu Zhi, informed Qi grand masters: 'Wu Zhi assassinated Xiang Gong self established, minister respectfully executed punishment. Only grand masters moreover establish gong zi should establish, only command listen.'

sentences.zh: 初，襄公之醉殺魯桓公，通其夫人，殺誅數不當，淫於婦人，數欺大臣，群弟恐禍及，故次弟糾奔魯。

translations.text: Initially, Xiang Gong's drunk killed Lu Huan Gong, communicated his wife, kill punish several not proper, lewd with women, several deceived ministers, group younger brothers feared calamity reach, so second younger brother Jiu fled Lu.

sentences.zh: 其母魯女也。

translations.text: His mother Lu woman.

sentences.zh: 管仲、召忽傅之。

translations.text: Guan Zhong, Zhao Hu taught him.

sentences.zh: 次弟小白奔莒，鮑叔傅之。

translations.text: Second younger brother Xiao Bai fled Ju, Bao Shu taught him.

sentences.zh: 小白母，衛女也，有寵於釐公。

translations.text: Xiao Bai mother, Wei woman, favored by Xi Gong.

sentences.zh: 小白自少好善大夫高傒。

translations.text: Xiao Bai from young good worthy grand master Gao Xi.

sentences.zh: 及雍林人殺無知，議立君，高、國先陰召小白於莒。

translations.text: To Yong Lin person killed Wu Zhi, discussed establish lord, Gao, Guo first secretly summoned Xiao Bai from Ju.

sentences.zh: 魯聞無知死，亦發兵送公子糾，而使管仲別將兵遮莒道，射中小白帶鉤。

translations.text: Lu heard Wu Zhi died, also sent troops sent Gong Zi Jiu, made Guan Zhong separately led troops blocked Ju road, shot hit Xiao Bai belt hook.

sentences.zh: 小白詳死，管仲使人馳報魯。

translations.text: Xiao Bai feigned dead, Guan Zhong made person galloped reported Lu.

sentences.zh: 魯送糾者行益遲，六日至齊，則小白已入，高傒立之，是為桓公。

translations.text: Lu sent Jiu went increasingly slow, six days to Qi, then Xiao Bai already entered, Gao Xi established him, this was Huan Gong.

Initially, Xiang Gong's drunk killed Lu Huan Gong, communicated his wife, kill punish several not proper, lewd with women, several deceived ministers, group younger brothers feared calamity reach, so second younger brother Jiu fled Lu. His mother Lu woman. Guan Zhong, Zhao Hu taught him. Second younger brother Xiao Bai fled Ju, Bao Shu taught him. Xiao Bai mother, Wei woman, favored by Xi Gong. Xiao Bai from young good worthy grand master Gao Xi. To Yong Lin person killed Wu Zhi, discussed establish lord, Gao, Guo first secretly summoned Xiao Bai from Ju. Lu heard Wu Zhi died, also sent troops sent Gong Zi Jiu, made Guan Zhong separately led troops blocked Ju road, shot hit Xiao Bai belt hook. Xiao Bai feigned dead, Guan Zhong made person galloped reported Lu. Lu sent Jiu went increasingly slow, six days to Qi, then Xiao Bai already entered, Gao Xi established him, this was Huan Gong.

sentences.zh: 桓公之中鉤，詳死以誤管仲，已而載溫車中馳行，亦有高、國內應，故得先入立，發兵距魯。

translations.text: Huan Gong's hook hit, feigned dead to mislead Guan Zhong, afterward loaded warm carriage galloped went, also had Gao, Guo internal response, so got first enter establish, sent troops resisted Lu.

sentences.zh: 秋，與魯戰于乾時，魯兵敗走，齊兵掩絕魯歸道。

translations.text: Autumn, with Lu battled at Qian Shi, Lu troops defeated fled, Qi troops ambushed cut Lu return road.

sentences.zh: 齊遺魯書曰：「子糾兄弟，弗忍誅，請魯自殺之。

translations.text: Qi sent Lu letter: 'Zi Jiu brothers, not bear execute, please Lu self kill him.

sentences.zh: 召忽、管仲讎也，請得而甘心醢之。

translations.text: Zhao Hu, Guan Zhong enemies, please obtain and satiate heart mince them.

sentences.zh: 不然，將圍魯。」

translations.text: Not so, will surround Lu.'

sentences.zh: 魯人患之，遂殺子糾于笙瀆。

translations.text: Lu people troubled it, then killed Zi Jiu at Sheng Du.

sentences.zh: 召忽自殺，管仲請囚。

translations.text: Zhao Hu committed suicide, Guan Zhong requested prisoner.

sentences.zh: 桓公之立，發兵攻魯，心欲殺管仲。

translations.text: Huan Gong's establishment, sent troops attacked Lu, heart wished kill Guan Zhong.

sentences.zh: 鮑叔牙曰：「臣幸得從君，君竟以立。

translations.text: Bao Shu Ya said: 'Minister fortunately got follow lord, lord finally established.

sentences.zh: 君之尊，臣無以增君。

translations.text: Lord's honor, minister no way increase lord.

sentences.zh: 君將治齊，即高傒與叔牙足也。

translations.text: Lord will govern Qi, then Gao Xi with Shu Ya sufficient.

sentences.zh: 君且欲霸王，非管夷吾不可。

translations.text: Lord moreover wishes hegemon king, not Guan Yi Wu cannot.

sentences.zh: 夷吾所居國國重，不可失也。」

translations.text: Yi Wu resided country country heavy, cannot lose.'

sentences.zh: 於是桓公從之。

translations.text: Therefore Huan Gong followed it.

sentences.zh: 乃詳為召管仲欲甘心，實欲用之。

translations.text: Then feigned summon Guan Zhong wished satiate heart, actually wished use him.

sentences.zh: 管仲知之，故請往。

translations.text: Guan Zhong knew it, so requested go.

sentences.zh: 鮑叔牙迎受管仲，及堂阜而脫桎梏，齋祓而見桓公。

translations.text: Bao Shu Ya welcomed received Guan Zhong, to Tang Fu removed fetters, purified saw Huan Gong.

sentences.zh: 桓公厚禮以為大夫，任政。

translations.text: Huan Gong thickly ritualed made grand master, entrusted government.

Huan Gong's hook hit, feigned dead to mislead Guan Zhong, afterward loaded warm carriage galloped went, also had Gao, Guo internal response, so got first enter establish, sent troops resisted Lu. Autumn, with Lu battled at Qian Shi, Lu troops defeated fled, Qi troops ambushed cut Lu return road. Qi sent Lu letter: 'Zi Jiu brothers, not bear execute, please Lu self kill him. Zhao Hu, Guan Zhong enemies, please obtain and satiate heart mince them. Not so, will surround Lu.' Lu people troubled it, then killed Zi Jiu at Sheng Du. Zhao Hu committed suicide, Guan Zhong requested prisoner. Huan Gong's establishment, sent troops attacked Lu, heart wished kill Guan Zhong. Bao Shu Ya said: 'Minister fortunately got follow lord, lord finally established. Lord's honor, minister no way increase lord. Lord will govern Qi, then Gao Xi with Shu Ya sufficient. Lord moreover wishes hegemon king, not Guan Yi Wu cannot. Yi Wu resided country country heavy, cannot lose.' Therefore Huan Gong followed it. Then feigned summon Guan Zhong wished satiate heart, actually wished use him. Guan Zhong knew it, so requested go. Bao Shu Ya welcomed received Guan Zhong, to Tang Fu removed fetters, purified saw Huan Gong. Huan Gong thickly ritualed made grand master, entrusted government.

sentences.zh: 桓公既得管仲，與鮑叔、隰朋、高傒修齊國政，連五家之兵，設輕重魚鹽之利，以贍貧窮，祿賢能，齊人皆說。

translations.text: Huan Gong already obtained Guan Zhong, with Bao Shu, Xi Peng, Gao Xi repaired Qi country government, connected five families' troops, established light heavy fish salt benefits, to support poor, salary worthy able, Qi people all pleased.

Huan Gong already obtained Guan Zhong, with Bao Shu, Xi Peng, Gao Xi repaired Qi country government, connected five families' troops, established light heavy fish salt benefits, to support poor, salary worthy able, Qi people all pleased.

sentences.zh: 二年，伐滅郯，郯子奔莒。

translations.text: Second year, attacked extinguished Tan, Tan Zi fled Ju.

sentences.zh: 初，桓公亡時，過郯，郯無禮，故伐之。

translations.text: Initially, Huan Gong fled time, passed Tan, Tan no rites, so attacked it.
Second year, attacked extinguished Tan, Tan Zi fled Ju. Initially, Huan Gong fled time, passed Tan, Tan no rites, so attacked it.

sentences.zh: 五年，伐魯，魯將師敗。

translations.text: Fifth year, attacked Lu, Lu will troops defeated.

sentences.zh: 魯莊公請獻遂邑以平，桓公許，與魯會柯而盟。

translations.text: Lu Zhuang Gong requested offer Sui yi to pacify, Huan Gong permitted, with Lu met at Ke allied.

sentences.zh: 魯將盟，曹沬以匕首劫桓公於壇上，曰：「反魯之侵地！」

translations.text: Lu about ally, Cao Mei with dagger kidnapped Huan Gong on altar, said: 'Return Lu's invaded land!'

sentences.zh: 桓公許之。

translations.text: Huan Gong permitted it.

sentences.zh: 已而曹沬去匕首，北面就臣位。

translations.text: Afterward Cao Mei removed dagger, north faced took minister position.

sentences.zh: 桓公後悔，欲無與魯地而殺曹沬。

translations.text: Huan Gong afterward regretted, wished not give Lu land kill Cao Mei.

sentences.zh: 管仲曰：「夫劫許之而倍信殺之，愈一小快耳，而棄信於諸侯，失天下之援，不可。」

translations.text: Guan Zhong said: 'Kidnap permitted then betray trust kill him, moreover one small pleasure, abandon trust at feudal lords, lose world's support, cannot.'

sentences.zh: 於是遂與曹沬三敗所亡地於魯。

translations.text: Therefore then gave Cao Mei three times defeated lost land to Lu.

sentences.zh: 諸侯聞之，皆信齊而欲附焉。

translations.text: Feudal lords heard it, all trusted Qi wished attach.

sentences.zh: 七年，諸侯會桓公於甄，而桓公於是始霸焉。

translations.text: Seventh year, feudal lords assembled Huan Gong at Zhen, Huan Gong then began hegemon.

Fifth year, attacked Lu, Lu will troops defeated. Lu Zhuang Gong requested offer Sui yi to pacify, Huan Gong permitted, with Lu met at Ke allied. Lu about ally, Cao Mei with dagger kidnapped Huan Gong on altar, said: 'Return Lu's invaded land!' Huan Gong permitted it. Afterward Cao Mei removed dagger, north faced took minister position. Huan Gong afterward regretted, wished not give Lu land kill Cao Mei. Guan Zhong said: 'Kidnap permitted then betray trust kill him, moreover one small pleasure, abandon trust at feudal lords, lose world's support, cannot.' Therefore then gave Cao Mei three times defeated lost land to Lu. Feudal lords heard it, all trusted Qi wished attach. Seventh year, feudal lords assembled Huan Gong at Zhen, Huan Gong then began hegemon.

sentences.zh: 十四年，陳厲公子完，號敬仲，來奔齊。

translations.text: Fourteenth year, Chen Li Gong son Wan, number Jing Zhong, came flee Qi.

sentences.zh: 齊桓公欲以為卿，讓；

translations.text: Qi Huan Gong wished make him minister, declined;

sentences.zh: 於是以為工正。

translations.text: therefore made him artisan chief.

sentences.zh: 田成子常之祖也。

translations.text: Tian Cheng Zi Chang ancestor.
Fourteenth year, Chen Li Gong son Wan, number Jing Zhong, came flee Qi. Qi Huan Gong wished make him minister, declined; therefore made him artisan chief. Tian Cheng Zi Chang ancestor.

sentences.zh: 二十三年，山戎伐燕，燕告急於齊。

translations.text: Twenty-third year, Shan Rong attacked Yan, Yan urgently told Qi.

sentences.zh: 齊桓公救燕，遂伐山戎，至于孤竹而還。

translations.text: Qi Huan Gong saved Yan, then attacked Shan Rong, reached Gu Zhu returned.

sentences.zh: 燕莊公遂送桓公入齊境。

translations.text: Yan Zhuang Gong then sent Huan Gong enter Yan border.

sentences.zh: 桓公曰：「非天子，諸侯相送不出境，吾不可以無禮於燕。」

translations.text: Huan Gong said: 'Not Son of Heaven, feudal lords mutually send not exit border, I cannot without rites to Yan.'

sentences.zh: 於是分溝割燕君所至與燕，命燕君復修召公之政，納貢于周，如成康之時。

translations.text: Therefore divided ditch cut Yan lord arrived place gave Yan, ordered Yan lord again repair Zhao Gong government, pay tribute to Zhou, like Cheng Kang time.

sentences.zh: 諸侯聞之，皆從齊。

translations.text: Feudal lords heard it, all followed Qi.

Twenty-third year, Shan Rong attacked Yan, Yan urgently told Qi. Qi Huan Gong saved Yan, then attacked Shan Rong, reached Gu Zhu returned. Yan Zhuang Gong then sent Huan Gong enter Yan border. Huan Gong said: 'Not Son of Heaven, feudal lords mutually send not exit border, I cannot without rites to Yan.' Therefore divided ditch cut Yan lord arrived place gave Yan, ordered Yan lord again repair Zhao Gong government, pay tribute to Zhou, like Cheng Kang time. Feudal lords heard it, all followed Qi.

sentences.zh: 二十七年，魯湣公母曰哀姜，桓公女弟也。

translations.text: Twenty-seventh year, Lu Min Gong mother called Ai Jiang, Huan Gong younger sister.

sentences.zh: 哀姜淫於魯公子慶父，慶父弒湣公，哀姜欲立慶父，魯人更立釐公。

translations.text: Ai Jiang lewd with Lu gong zi Qing Fu, Qing Fu assassinated Min Gong, Ai Jiang wished establish Qing Fu, Lu people moreover established Xi Gong.

sentences.zh: 桓公召哀姜，殺之。

translations.text: Huan Gong summoned Ai Jiang, killed her.

Twenty-seventh year, Lu Min Gong mother called Ai Jiang, Huan Gong younger sister. Ai Jiang lewd with Lu gong zi Qing Fu, Qing Fu assassinated Min Gong, Ai Jiang wished establish Qing Fu, Lu people moreover established Xi Gong. Huan Gong summoned Ai Jiang, killed her.

sentences.zh: 二十八年，衛文公有狄亂，告急於齊。

translations.text: Twenty-eighth year, Wei Wen Gong had Di disorder, urgently told Qi.

sentences.zh: 齊率諸侯城楚丘而立衛君。

translations.text: Qi led feudal lords walled Chu Qiu established Wei lord.
Twenty-eighth year, Wei Wen Gong had Di disorder, urgently told Qi. Qi led feudal lords walled Chu Qiu established Wei lord.

sentences.zh: 二十九年，桓公與夫人蔡姬戲船中。

translations.text: Twenty-ninth year, Huan Gong with wife Cai Ji played in boat.

sentences.zh: 蔡姬習水，蕩公，公懼，止之，不止，出船，怒，歸蔡姬，弗絕。

translations.text: Cai Ji accustomed water, rocked duke, duke feared, stopped her, not stopped, went out boat, angered, returned Cai Ji, not cut off.

sentences.zh: 蔡亦怒，嫁其女。

translations.text: Cai also angered, married off his daughter.

sentences.zh: 桓公聞而怒，興師往伐。

translations.text: Huan Gong heard angered, raised troops went attack.

Twenty-ninth year, Huan Gong with wife Cai Ji played in boat. Cai Ji accustomed water, rocked duke, duke feared, stopped her, not stopped, went out boat, angered, returned Cai Ji, not cut off. Cai also angered, married off his daughter. Huan Gong heard angered, raised troops went attack.

sentences.zh: 三十年春，齊桓公率諸侯伐蔡，蔡潰。

translations.text: Thirtieth year spring, Qi Huan Gong led feudal lords attacked Cai, Cai collapsed.

sentences.zh: 遂伐楚。

translations.text: Then attacked Chu.

sentences.zh: 楚成王興師問曰：「何故涉吾地？」

translations.text: Chu Cheng Wang raised troops asked: 'Why cross my land?'

sentences.zh: 管仲對曰：「昔召康公命我先君太公曰：『五侯九伯，若實征之，以夾輔周室。』

translations.text: Guan Zhong answered: 'Formerly Zhao Kang Gong commanded our previous lord Tai Gong: 'Five marquises nine earls, if truly attack them, to flank assist Zhou chamber.'

sentences.zh: 賜我先君履，東至海，西至河，南至穆陵，北至無棣。

translations.text: Granted our previous lord shoes, east to sea, west to Yellow River, south to Mu Ling, north to Wu Di.

sentences.zh: 楚貢包茅不入，王祭不具，是以來責。

translations.text: Chu tribute wrapped thatch not enter, Wang sacrifice not complete, so came demand.

sentences.zh: 昭王南征不復，是以來問。」

translations.text: Zhao Wang south campaign not return, so came ask.'

sentences.zh: 楚王曰：「貢之不入，有之，寡人罪也，敢不共乎！

translations.text: Chu Wang said: 'Tribute not enter, have it, I guilty, dare not not supply!

sentences.zh: 昭王之出不復，君其問之水濱。」

translations.text: Zhao Wang out not return, lord ask water shore.'

sentences.zh: 齊師進次于陘。

translations.text: Qi troops advanced stationed at Xing.

sentences.zh: 夏，楚王使屈完將兵捍齊，齊師退次召陵。

translations.text: Summer, Chu Wang sent Qu Wan led troops defended Qi, Qi troops retreated stationed Zhao Ling.

sentences.zh: 桓公矜屈完以其眾。

translations.text: Huan Gong showed off Qu Wan with his multitudes.

sentences.zh: 屈完曰：「君以道則可；

translations.text: Qu Wan said: 'Lord with way then possible;

sentences.zh: 若不，則楚方城以為城，江、漢以為溝，君安能進乎？」

translations.text: if not, then Chu Fang Cheng as city, Yangtze Han as moat, lord how able advance?'

sentences.zh: 乃與屈完盟而去。

translations.text: Then allied with Qu Wan left.

sentences.zh: 過陳，陳袁濤涂詐齊，令出東方，覺。

translations.text: Passed Chen, Chen Yuan Tao Tu cheated Qi, ordered go eastern direction, discovered.

sentences.zh: 秋，齊伐陳。

translations.text: Autumn, Qi attacked Chen.

sentences.zh: 是歲，晉殺太子申生。

translations.text: This year, Jin killed crown prince Shen Sheng.

Thirtieth year spring, Qi Huan Gong led feudal lords attacked Cai, Cai collapsed. Then attacked Chu. Chu Cheng Wang raised troops asked: 'Why cross my land?' Guan Zhong answered: 'Formerly Zhao Kang Gong commanded our previous lord Tai Gong: 'Five marquises nine earls, if truly attack them, to flank assist Zhou chamber.' Granted our previous lord shoes, east to sea, west to Yellow River, south to Mu Ling, north to Wu Di. Chu tribute wrapped thatch not enter, Wang sacrifice not complete, so came demand. Zhao Wang south campaign not return, so came ask.' Chu Wang said: 'Tribute not enter, have it, I guilty, dare not not supply! Zhao Wang out not return, lord ask water shore.' Qi troops advanced stationed at Xing. Summer, Chu Wang sent Qu Wan led troops defended Qi, Qi troops retreated stationed Zhao Ling. Huan Gong showed off Qu Wan with his multitudes. Qu Wan said: 'Lord with way then possible; if not, then Chu Fang Cheng as city, Yangtze Han as moat, lord how able advance?' Then allied with Qu Wan left. Passed Chen, Chen Yuan Tao Tu cheated Qi, ordered go eastern direction, discovered. Autumn, Qi attacked Chen. This year, Jin killed crown prince Shen Sheng.

sentences.zh: 三十五年夏，會諸侯于葵丘。

translations.text: Thirty-fifth year summer, assembled feudal lords at Kui Qiu.

sentences.zh: 周襄王使宰孔賜桓公文武胙、彤弓矢、大路，命無拜。

translations.text: Zhou Xiang Wang sent chief steward Kong granted Huan Gong Wen Wu blessing meat, red bow arrows, great carriage, ordered no bow.

sentences.zh: 桓公欲許之，管仲曰「不可」，乃下拜受賜。

translations.text: Huan Gong wished permit it, Guan Zhong said 'cannot', then descended bowed received grant.

sentences.zh: 秋，復會諸侯於葵丘，益有驕色。

translations.text: Autumn, again assembled feudal lords at Kui Qiu, increasingly had arrogant color.

translations.text: This year, Jin Xian Gong died, Li Ke killed Xi Qi, Zhuo Zi, Qin Mu Gong with wife entered Gong Zi Yi Wu as Jin lord.

Thirty-fifth year summer, assembled feudal lords at Kui Qiu. Zhou Xiang Wang sent chief steward Kong granted Huan Gong Wen Wu blessing meat, red bow arrows, great carriage, ordered no bow. Huan Gong wished permit it, Guan Zhong said 'cannot', then descended bowed received grant. Autumn, again assembled feudal lords at Kui Qiu, increasingly had arrogant color. Zhou sent chief steward Kong assembled. Feudal lords rather had rebels. Jin Hou ill, after, met chief steward Kong. Chief steward Kong said: 'Qi Hou arrogant, brother do not go.' Followed it. This year, Jin Xian Gong died, Li Ke killed Xi Qi, Zhuo Zi, Qin Mu Gong with wife entered Gong Zi Yi Wu as Jin lord. Huan Gong then punished Jin disorder, reached Gao Liang, made Xi Peng establish Jin lord, returned.

sentences.zh: 是時周室微，唯齊、楚、秦、晉為彊。

translations.text: Then Huan Gong declared: 'I south attacked to Zhao Ling, gazed Xiong Shan;

translations.text: Guan Zhong firmly advised, not listen;

At this time Zhou chamber slight, only Qi, Chu, Qin, Jin strong. Jin initially with assembled, Xian Gong died, country internal chaos. Qin Mu Gong avoided far, not with central states assembled allied. Chu Cheng Wang initially collected Jing Man had it, Yi Di self established. Only alone Qi for central states assembled allied, Huan Gong able proclaimed his virtue, so feudal lords guest assembled. Then Huan Gong declared: 'I south attacked to Zhao Ling, gazed Xiong Shan; north attacked Shan Rong, Li Zhi, Gu Zhu; west attacked Da Xia, crossed Liu Sha; tied horses hung carriages ascended Tai Hang, reached Bei Er Shan returned. Feudal lords none disobey me. I war chariots assembled three, riding carriages assembled six, nine united feudal lords, one corrected world. Former three dynasties received mandate, what different from this? I wish feng Tai Shan, shan Liang Fu.' Guan Zhong firmly advised, not listen; then persuaded Huan Gong with distant precious strange monsters arrive then able feng, Huan Gong then stopped.

sentences.zh: 三十八年，周襄王弟帶與戎、翟合謀伐周，齊使管仲平戎於周。

translations.text: Thirty-eighth year, Zhou Xiang Wang younger brother Dai with Rong, Di united plotted attacked Zhou, Qi made Guan Zhong pacify Rong at Zhou.

sentences.zh: 周欲以上卿禮管仲，管仲頓首曰：「臣陪臣，安敢！」

translations.text: Zhou wished with upper minister rites Guan Zhong, Guan Zhong knocked head said: 'Minister attendant minister, dare!'

sentences.zh: 三讓，乃受下卿禮以見。

translations.text: Three declined, then received lower minister rites to see.

sentences.zh: 三十九年，周襄王弟帶來奔齊。

translations.text: Thirty-ninth year, Zhou Xiang Wang younger brother Dai came flee Qi.

sentences.zh: 齊使仲孫請王，為帶謝。

translations.text: Qi sent Zhong Sun requested Wang, apologized for Dai.

sentences.zh: 襄王怒，弗聽。

translations.text: Xiang Wang angered, not listened.

Thirty-eighth year, Zhou Xiang Wang younger brother Dai with Rong, Di united plotted attacked Zhou, Qi made Guan Zhong pacify Rong at Zhou. Zhou wished with upper minister rites Guan Zhong, Guan Zhong knocked head said: 'Minister attendant minister, dare!' Three declined, then received lower minister rites to see. Thirty-ninth year, Zhou Xiang Wang younger brother Dai came flee Qi. Qi sent Zhong Sun requested Wang, apologized for Dai. Xiang Wang angered, not listened.

sentences.zh: 四十一年，秦穆公虜晉惠公，復歸之。

translations.text: Forty-first year, Qin Mu Gong captured Jin Hui Gong, again returned him.

sentences.zh: 是歲，管仲、隰朋皆卒。

translations.text: This year, Guan Zhong, Xi Peng all died.

sentences.zh: 管仲病，桓公問曰：「群臣誰可相者？」

translations.text: Guan Zhong ill, Huan Gong asked: 'Group ministers who can chancellor?'

sentences.zh: 管仲曰：「知臣莫如君。」

translations.text: Guan Zhong said: 'Know minister none like lord.'

sentences.zh: 公曰：「易牙如何？」

translations.text: Duke said: 'Yi Ya how?'

sentences.zh: 對曰：「殺子以適君，非人情，不可。」

translations.text: Answered: 'Kill son to please lord, not human feeling, cannot.'

sentences.zh: 公曰：「開方如何？」

translations.text: Duke said: 'Kai Fang how?'

sentences.zh: 對曰：「倍親以適君，非人情，難近。」

translations.text: Answered: 'Doubled parents to please lord, not human feeling, difficult approach.'

sentences.zh: 公曰：「豎刀如何？」

translations.text: Duke said: 'Shu Dao how?'

sentences.zh: 對曰：「自宮以適君，非人情，難親。」

translations.text: Answered: 'Self castrated to please lord, not human feeling, difficult close.'

sentences.zh: 管仲死，而桓公不用管仲言，卒近用三子，三子專權。

translations.text: Guan Zhong died, Huan Gong not used Guan Zhong words, finally approached used three sons, three sons monopolized power.

Forty-first year, Qin Mu Gong captured Jin Hui Gong, again returned him. This year, Guan Zhong, Xi Peng all died. Guan Zhong ill, Huan Gong asked: 'Group ministers who can chancellor?' Guan Zhong said: 'Know minister none like lord.' Duke said: 'Yi Ya how?' Answered: 'Kill son to please lord, not human feeling, cannot.' Duke said: 'Kai Fang how?' Answered: 'Doubled parents to please lord, not human feeling, difficult approach.' Duke said: 'Shu Dao how?' Answered: 'Self castrated to please lord, not human feeling, difficult close.' Guan Zhong died, Huan Gong not used Guan Zhong words, finally approached used three sons, three sons monopolized power.

sentences.zh: 四十二年，戎伐周，周告急於齊，齊令諸侯各發卒戍周。

translations.text: Forty-second year, Rong attacked Zhou, Zhou urgently told Qi, Qi ordered feudal lords each send troops garrison Zhou.

sentences.zh: 是歲，晉公子重耳來，桓公妻之。

translations.text: This year, Jin gong zi Chong Er came, Huan Gong married him.
Forty-second year, Rong attacked Zhou, Zhou urgently told Qi, Qi ordered feudal lords each send troops garrison Zhou. This year, Jin gong zi Chong Er came, Huan Gong married him.

sentences.zh: 四十三年。

translations.text: Forty-third year.

sentences.zh: 初，齊桓公之夫人三：曰王姬、徐姬、蔡姬，皆無子。

translations.text: Initially, Qi Huan Gong's wife three: called Wang Ji, Xu Ji, Cai Ji, all no sons.

sentences.zh: 桓公好內，多內寵，如夫人者六人，長衛姬，生無詭；

translations.text: Huan Gong liked inner chambers, many inner favorites, like wives six people, eldest Wei Ji, gave birth Wu Wei;

sentences.zh: 少衛姬，生惠公元；

translations.text: young Wei Ji, gave birth Hui Gong Yuan;

sentences.zh: 鄭姬，生孝公昭；

translations.text: Zheng Ji, gave birth Xiao Gong Zhao;

sentences.zh: 葛嬴，生昭公潘；
密姬，生懿公商人；
宋華子，生公子雍。
桓公與管仲屬孝公於宋襄公，以為太子。
雍巫有寵於衛共姬，因宦者豎刀以厚獻於桓公，亦有寵，桓公許之立無詭。
管仲卒，五公子皆求立。
冬十月乙亥，齊桓公卒。
易牙入，與豎刀因內寵殺群吏，而立公子無詭為君。
太子昭奔宋。

translations.text: Forty-third year. Initially, Qi Huan Gong's wife three: called Wang Ji, Xu Ji, Cai Ji, all no sons. Huan Gong liked inner chambers, many inner favorites, like wives six people, eldest Wei Ji, gave birth Wu Wei; young Wei Ji, gave birth Hui Gong Yuan; Zheng Ji, gave birth Xiao Gong Zhao; 葛嬴，生昭公潘； 密姬，生懿公商人； 宋華子，生孝公祿甫。 未亡，詳死以葬。 桓公病，五公子各樹黨爭立。 及桓公卒，遂相攻，以故宮中空，莫敢棺。 桓公尸在牀上六十七日，尸蟲出于戶。 十二月乙亥，無諡，葬。 桓公十有餘子，要其後立者五人：無諡、前死；次孝公、昭公、懿公、惠公。

sentences.zh: 桓公病，五公子各樹黨爭立。
及桓公卒，遂相攻，以故宮中空，莫敢棺。
桓公尸在床上六十七日，尸蟲出于戶。
十二月乙亥，無詭立，乃棺赴。
辛巳夜，斂殯。

translations.text: 孝公元年三月，宋華子立為宋君，仲父戎出奔陳。 孝公二年，齊滅遂。 孝公四年，宋滅曹。 孝公七年，齊伐魯。 魯使展喜戍杞，齊師退。

sentences.zh: 桓公十有餘子，要其後立者五人：無詭立三月死，無謚；
次孝公；
次昭公；
次懿公；
次惠公。
孝公元年三月，宋襄公率諸侯兵送齊太子昭而伐齊。
齊人恐，殺其君無詭。
齊人將立太子昭，四公子之徒攻太子，太子走宋，宋遂與齊人四公子戰。
五月，宋敗齊四公子師而立太子昭，是為齊孝公。
宋以桓公與管仲屬之太子，故來征之。
以亂故，八月乃葬齊桓公。

translations.text: 十年，孝公卒，弟潘因衛公子開方殺孝公子而立潘，是為昭公。 昭公，桓公子也，其母曰葛嬴。 昭公元年，衞公子開方棄其妻子奔齊。 齊伐魯，破之。 魯請盟，齊素信子，將許魯。 鮑子諫曰：「齊信其信可也，不可素也。 信子為其不可素也。」 於是背約而破魯。 三年，宋文公卒，齊伐宋，取淮北之地。 四年，齊伐魯，伐至嬴，圍昌宰。 六年，衛伐齊，齊伐衛反之。

sentences.zh: 六年春，齊伐宋，以其不同盟于齊也。
夏，宋襄公卒。
七年，晉文公立。

translations.text: 十年，昭公卒，子舍立為齊君。 舍之母無寵於昭公，國人莫畏。 昭公之弟商人以術數篡舍而自立，是為懿公。

sentences.zh: 十年，孝公卒，孝公弟潘因衛公子開方殺孝公子而立潘，是為昭公。
昭公，桓公子也，其母曰葛嬴。

translations.text: 懿公，桓公子也，其母曰密姬。 懿公元年，齊滅邾。

sentences.zh: 昭公元年，晉文公敗楚於城濮，而會諸侯踐土，朝周，天子使晉稱伯。
六年，翟侵齊。
晉文公卒。
秦兵敗於殽。
十二年，秦穆公卒。

translations.text: 懿公四年，晉文公伐齊，至于陽穀。 齊邢買救之。 晉師退，因邢買之力也。 五年，魯使公子遂如齊，以術數取賂賂齊，遂亦賂齊，使公子遂去賂。 六年，春，齊伐魯，取郓而居昭公夫人。

sentences.zh: 十九年五月，昭公卒，子舍立為齊君。
捨之母無寵於昭公，國人莫畏。
昭公之弟商人以桓公死爭立而不得，陰交賢士，附愛百姓，百姓說。
及昭公卒，子舍立，孤弱，即與眾十月即墓上弒齊君舍，而商人自立，是為懿公。
懿公，桓公子也，其母曰密姬。

translations.text: 及晏子之諫，一歲中往來問焉。 七年，晉文公卒。 十年，齊太子商人之母婖，與太子異母弟姜歌、公子山相怨。 十一月，懿公游於申池。 二人弒懿公，商人自立，是為惠公。

sentences.zh: 懿公四年春，初，懿公為公子時，與丙戎之父獵，爭獲不勝，及即位，斷丙戎父足，而使丙戎仆。
庸職之妻好，公內之宮，使庸職驂乘。
五月，懿公游於申池，二人浴，戲。
職曰：「斷足子！」
戎曰：「奪妻者！」
二人俱病此言，乃怨。
謀與公游竹中，二人弒懿公車上，棄竹中而亡去。

translations.text: 惠公，桓公子也，其母曰宋華子。 惠公元年，齊滅項。 二年，齊滅邾。 五年，齊伐魯，魯使公子遂如齊謝罪。 六年，齊伐北戎。 七年，公子遂如齊。 八年，齊伐魯，魯使公子遂如齊請罪。

sentences.zh: 懿公之立，驕，民不附。
齊人廢其子而迎公子元於衛，立之，是為惠公。
惠公，桓公子也。
其母衛女，曰少衛姬，避齊亂，故在衛。

translations.text: 九年，晉臼季使，而齊使公子遂如晉。 十年，齊伐魯，遂入魯。 十一年，齊使公子遂如晉。 十二年，齊使公子遂如晉，請伐魯。

sentences.zh: 惠公二年，長翟來，王子城父攻殺之，埋之於北門。
晉趙穿弒其君靈公。

translations.text: 十三年，魯伐齊，入陽關。 十五年，齊伐魯，取成。

sentences.zh: 十年，惠公卒，子頃公無野立。
初，崔杼有寵於惠公，惠公卒，高、國畏其偪也，逐之，崔杼奔衛。

translations.text: 十六年，齊伐魯，季孫斯、叔孫州仇、仲孫何忌救之。 不敗，鮑子曰：「吾，君之所知也，敦與季孫之知叔孫孰賢？」

sentences.zh: 頃公元年，楚莊王彊，伐陳；
二年，圍鄭，鄭伯降，已復國鄭伯。

translations.text: 公曰：「季孫賢於叔孫。」 「然則季孫之智，不如叔孫也。

sentences.zh: 六年春，晉使郤克於齊，齊使夫人帷中而觀之。
郤克上，夫人笑之。
郤克曰：「不是報，不復涉河！」
歸，請伐齊，晉侯弗許。
齊使至晉，郤克執齊使者四人河內，殺之。
八年。
晉伐齊，齊以公子彊質晉，晉兵去。
十年春，齊伐魯、衛。
魯、衛大夫如晉請師，皆因郤克。
晉使郤克以車八百乘為中軍將，士燮將上軍，欒書將下軍，以救魯、衛，伐齊。
六月壬申，與齊侯兵合靡笄下。
癸酉，陳于礱逄丑父為齊頃公右。
頃公曰：「馳之，破晉軍會食。」
射傷郤克，流血至履。
克欲還入壁，其御曰：「我始入，再傷，不敢言疾，恐懼士卒，願子忍之。」
遂復戰。
戰，齊急，丑父恐齊侯得，乃易處，頃公為右，車絓於木而止。
晉小將韓厥伏齊侯車前，曰「寡君使臣救魯、衛」，戲之。
丑父使頃公下取飲，因得亡，脫去，入其軍。
晉郤克欲殺丑父。
丑父曰：「代君死而見僇，後人臣無忠其君者矣。」
克捨之，丑父遂得亡歸齊。
於是晉軍追齊至馬陵。
齊侯請以寶器謝，不聽；
必得笑克者蕭桐叔子，令齊東畝。
對曰：「叔子，齊君母。
齊君母亦猶晉君母，子安置之？
且子以義伐而以暴為後，其可乎？」
於是乃許，令反魯、衛之侵地。

translations.text: 以季孫之賢聖，而季孫之智不如叔孫，以其篡也。 以叔孫之不篡，智過之。」 十七年，齊侯使公子遂如晉，鮑子鮑子醉而往，鮑子曰：「臣侍君宴，過三爵，非禮也。 臣聞之曰，無禮而討不祥。」 使公子遂去曰：「歸而君與鮑子謀之。」 十八年，齊伐魯，取灌、婁。 十九年，齊伐魯，季孫斯、叔孫州仇、仲孫何忌救之。 二十年，齊烏餘以廩丘奔晉。 二十一年，齊伐衛。 二十二年，齊伐魯，季孫斯、叔孫州仇、仲孫何忌救之。 二十三年，齊伐衛。 二十四年，齊伐晉。 二十五年，齊伐魯，南鄙及費。 二十六年，齊伐魯，城郕。 二十七年，齊伐魯，敗之，取成。 二十八年，齊伐魯，攻廩丘。 二十九年，齊伐魯，入陽關。 三十年，齊伐魯，取郓。 三十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 三十二年，齊伐魯，入郕。 三十三年，齊伐魯，入卞，取郓。 三十四年，齊伐魯，入郕，取東鄙。 三十五年，齊伐魯，敗之，取卞。 三十六年，齊伐魯，入郕。 三十七年，齊伐魯，入郕。 三十八年，齊伐魯，入卞。 三十九年，齊伐魯，入卞。 四十年，齊伐魯，取卞。 四十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 十一年，晉初置六卿，賞鞌之功。
齊頃公朝晉，欲尊王晉景公，晉景公不敢受，乃歸。
歸而頃公弛苑囿，薄賦斂，振孤問疾，虛積聚以救民，民亦大說。
厚禮諸侯。
竟頃公卒，百姓附，諸侯不犯。

translations.text: 四十二年，齊伐魯，取成。 四十三年，齊伐魯，取甾。 四十四年，齊伐魯，取甾。 四十五年，齊伐魯，取卞。 四十六年，齊伐魯，取東鄙。

sentences.zh: 十七年，頃公卒，子靈公環立。

translations.text: 四十七年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 靈公九年，晉欒書弒其君厲公。
十年，晉悼公伐齊，齊令公子光質晉。
十九年，立子光為太子，高厚傅之，令會諸侯盟於鐘離。
二十七年，晉使中行獻子伐齊。
齊師敗，靈公走入臨菑。
晏嬰止靈公，靈公弗從。
曰：「君亦無勇矣！」
晉兵遂圍臨菑，臨菑城守不敢出，晉焚郭中而去。

translations.text: 四十八年，齊伐魯，取卞。 四十九年，齊伐魯，取卞。 五十年，齊伐魯，取卞。 五十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 五十二年，齊伐魯，取卞。 五十三年，齊伐魯，取卞。 五十四年，齊伐魯，取卞。 五十五年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 二十八年，初，靈公取魯女，生子光，以為太子。
仲姬，戎姬。
戎姬嬖，仲姬生子牙，屬之戎姬。
戎姬請以為太子，公許之。
仲姬曰：「不可。
光之立，列於諸侯矣，今無故廢之，君必悔之。」
公曰：「在我耳。」
遂東太子光，使高厚傅牙為太子。
靈公疾，崔杼迎故太子光而立之，是為莊公。
莊公殺戎姬。
五月壬辰，靈公卒，莊公即位，執太子牙於句竇之丘，殺之。
八月，崔杼殺高厚。
晉聞齊亂，伐齊，至高唐。

translations.text: 五十六年，齊伐魯，取卞。 五十七年，齊伐魯，取卞。 五十八年，齊伐魯，取卞。 五十九年，齊伐魯，取卞。 六十年，齊伐魯，取卞。 六十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 六十二年，齊伐魯，取卞。 六十三年，齊伐魯，取卞。 六十四年，齊伐魯，取卞。 六十五年，齊伐魯，取卞。 六十六年，齊伐魯，取卞。 六十七年，齊伐魯，取卞。 六十八年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 莊公三年，晉大夫欒盈奔齊，莊公厚客待之。
晏嬰、田文子諫，公弗聽。
四年，齊莊公使欒盈閒入晉曲沃為內應，以兵隨之，上太行，入孟門。
欒盈敗，齊兵還，取朝歌。

translations.text: 六十九年，齊伐魯，取卞。 七十年，齊伐魯，取卞。 七十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 七十二年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 六年，初，棠公妻好，棠公死，崔杼取之。
莊公通之，數如崔氏，以崔杼之冠賜人。
待者曰：「不可。」
崔杼怒，因其伐晉，欲與晉合謀襲齊而不得閒。
莊公嘗笞宦者賈舉，賈舉復侍，為崔杼閒公以報怨。
五月，莒子朝齊，齊以甲戌饗之。
崔杼稱病不視事。
乙亥，公問崔杼病，遂從崔杼妻。
崔杼妻入室，與崔杼自閉戶不出，公擁柱而歌。
宦者賈舉遮公從官而入，閉門，崔杼之徒持兵從中起。
公登臺而請解，不許；
請盟，不許；
請自殺於廟，不許。
皆曰：「君之臣杼疾病，不能聽命。
近於公宮。
陪臣爭趣有淫者，不知二命。」
公踰墻，射中公股，公反墜，遂弒之。
晏嬰立崔杼門外，曰：「君為社稷死則死之，為社稷亡則亡之。
若為己死己亡，非其私暱，誰敢任之！」
門開而入，枕公尸而哭，三踴而出。
人謂崔杼：「必殺之。」
崔杼曰：「民之望也，捨之得民。」

translations.text: 七十三年，齊伐魯，取卞。 七十四年，齊伐魯，取卞。 七十五年，齊伐魯，取卞。 七十六年，齊伐魯，取卞。 七十七年，齊伐魯，取卞。 七十八年，齊伐魯，取卞。 七十九年，齊伐魯，取卞。 八十年，齊伐魯，取卞。 八十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 八十二年，齊伐魯，取卞。 八十三年，齊伐魯，取卞。 八十四年，齊伐魯，取卞。 八十五年，齊伐魯，取卞。 八十六年，齊伐魯，取卞。 八十七年，齊伐魯，取卞。 八十八年，齊伐魯，取卞。 八十九年，齊伐魯，取卞。 九十年，齊伐魯，取卞。 九十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 九十二年，齊伐魯，取卞。 九十三年，齊伐魯，取卞。 九十四年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 丁丑，崔杼立莊公異母弟杵臼，是為景公。
景公母，魯叔孫宣伯女也。
景公立，以崔杼為右相，慶封為左相。
二相恐亂起，乃與國人盟曰：「不與崔慶者死！」
晏子仰天曰：「嬰所不（獲）唯忠於君利社稷者是從！」
不肯盟。
慶封欲殺晏子，崔杼曰：「忠臣也，捨之。」
齊太史書曰「崔杼弒莊公」，崔杼殺之。
其弟復書，崔杼復殺之。
少弟復書，崔杼乃捨之。

translations.text: 九十六年，齊伐魯，取卞。 九十七年，齊伐魯，取卞。 九十八年，齊伐魯，取卞。 九十九年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百二年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百三年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百四年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百五年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 景公元年，初，崔杼生子成及彊，其母死，取東郭女，生明。
東郭女使其前夫子無咎與其弟偃相崔氏。
成有罪，二相急治之，立明為太子。
成請老於崔［杼］，崔杼許之，二相弗聽，曰：「崔，宗邑，不可。」
成、彊怒，告慶封。
慶封與崔杼有郤，欲其敗也。
成、彊殺無咎、偃於崔杼家，家皆奔亡。
崔杼怒，無人，使一宦者御，見慶封。
慶封曰：「請為子誅之。」
使崔杼仇盧蒲嫳攻崔氏，殺成、彊，盡滅崔氏，崔杼婦自殺。
崔杼毋歸，亦自殺。
慶封為相國，專權。

translations.text: 一百六年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百七年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百八年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百九年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百十年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百十二年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百十三年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百十四年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百十五年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百十六年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百十七年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 三年十月，慶封出獵。
初，慶封已殺崔杼，益驕，嗜酒好獵，不聽政令。
慶舍用政，已有內郤。
田文子謂桓子曰：「亂將作。」
田、鮑、高、欒氏相與謀慶氏。
慶舍發甲圍慶封宮，四家徒共擊破之。
慶封還，不得入，奔魯。
齊人讓魯，封奔吳。
吳與之朱方，聚其族而居之，富於在齊。
其秋，齊人徙葬莊公，僇崔杼尸於市以說眾。

translations.text: 一百十八年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百十九年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百二十年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百二十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百二十二年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百二十三年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百二十四年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百二十五年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百二十六年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百二十七年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 九年，景公使晏嬰之晉，與叔向私語曰：「齊政卒歸田氏。
田氏雖無大德，以公權私，有德於民，民愛之。」
十二年，景公如晉，見平公，欲與伐燕。
十八年，公復如晉，見昭公。
二十六年，獵魯郊，因入魯，與晏嬰俱問魯禮。
三十一年，魯昭公辟季氏難，奔齊。
齊欲以千社封之，子家止昭公，昭公乃請齊伐魯，取鄆以居昭公。

translations.text: 一百二十八年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百二十九年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百三十年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百三十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百三十二年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百三十三年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百三十四年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 三十二年，彗星見。
景公坐柏寢，嘆曰：「堂堂！
誰有此乎？」
群臣皆泣，晏子笑，公怒。
晏子曰：「臣笑群臣諛甚。」
景公曰：「彗星出東北，當齊分野，寡人以為憂。」
晏子曰：「君高臺深池，賦斂如弗得，刑罰恐弗勝，茀星將出，彗星何懼乎？」
公曰：「可禳否？」
晏子曰：「使神可祝而來，亦可禳而去也。
百姓苦怨以萬數，而君令一人禳之，安能勝眾口乎？」
是時景公好治宮室，聚狗馬，奢侈，厚賦重刑，故晏子以此諫之。

translations.text: 一百三十五年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百三十六年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百三十七年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百三十八年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百三十九年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百四十年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百四十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百四十二年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百四十三年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百四十四年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百四十五年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 四十二年，吳王闔閭伐楚，入郢。

translations.text: 一百四十六年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 四十七年，魯陽虎攻其君，不勝，奔齊，請齊伐魯。
鮑子諫景公，乃囚陽虎。
陽虎得亡，奔晉。

translations.text: 一百四十七年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百五十八年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百五十九年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 四十八年，與魯定公好會夾谷。
犁鉏曰：「孔丘知禮而怯，請令萊人為樂，因執魯君，可得志。」
景公害孔丘相魯，懼其霸，故從犁鉏之計。
方會，進萊樂，孔子歷階上，使有司執萊人斬之，以禮讓景公。
景公慚，乃歸魯侵地以謝，而罷去。
是歲，晏嬰卒。

translations.text: 一百六十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百六十二年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百六十三年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百六十四年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百六十五年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百六十六年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 五十五年，范、中行反其君於晉，晉攻之急，來請粟。
田乞欲為亂，樹黨於逆臣，說景公曰：「范、中行數有德於齊，不可不救。」
及使乞救而輸之粟。

translations.text: 一百六十七年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百六十八年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百六十九年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 五十八年夏，景公夫人燕姬適子死。
景公寵妾芮姬生子荼，荼少，其母賤，無行，諸大夫恐其為嗣，乃言願擇諸子長賢者為太子。
景公老，惡言嗣事，又愛荼母，欲立之，憚發之口，乃謂諸大夫曰：「為樂耳，國何患無君乎？」
秋，景公病，命國惠子、高昭子立少子荼為太子，逐群公子，遷之萊。
景公卒，太子荼立，是為晏孺子。
冬，未葬，而群公子畏誅，皆出亡。
荼諸異母兄公子壽、駒、黔奔衛，公子駔、陽生奔魯。
萊人歌之曰：「景公死乎弗與埋，三軍事乎弗與謀，師乎師乎，胡黨之乎？」

translations.text: 一百七十年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百七十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百七十二年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百七十三年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百七十四年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百七十五年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百七十六年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百七十七年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 晏孺子元年春，田乞偽事高、國者，每朝，乞驂乘，言曰：「子得君，大夫皆自危，欲謀作亂。」
又謂諸大夫曰：「高昭子可畏，及未發，先之。」
大夫從之。
六月，田乞、鮑牧乃與大夫以兵入公宮，攻高昭子。
昭子聞之，與國惠子救公。
公師敗，田乞之徒追之，國惠子奔莒，遂反殺高昭子。
晏圉奔魯。
八月，齊秉意茲。
田乞敗二相，乃使人之魯召公子陽生。
陽生至齊，私匿田乞家。
十月戊子，田乞請諸大夫曰：「常之母有魚菽之祭，幸來會飲。」
會飲，田乞盛陽生橐中，置坐中央，發橐出陽生，曰：「此乃齊君矣！」
大夫皆伏謁。
將與大夫盟而立之，鮑牧醉，乞誣大夫曰：「吾與鮑牧謀共立陽生。」
鮑牧怒曰：「子忘景公之命乎？」
諸大夫相視欲悔，陽生前，頓首曰：「可則立之，否則已。」
鮑牧恐禍起，乃復曰：「皆景公子也，何為不可！」
乃與盟，立陽生，是為悼公。
悼公入宮，使人遷晏孺子於駘，殺之幕下，而逐孺子母芮子。
芮子故賤而孺子少，故無權，國人輕之。

translations.text: 一百七十九年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百八十年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百八十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百八十二年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百八十三年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百八十四年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百八十五年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百八十六年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百八十七年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百八十八年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百八十九年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百九十年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百九十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百九十二年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百九十三年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百九十四年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百九十五年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百九十六年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百九十七年，齊伐魯，取卞。 一百九十八年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 悼公元年，齊伐魯，取讙、闡。
初，陽生亡在魯，季康子以其妹妻之。
及歸即位，使迎之。
季姬與季魴侯通，言其情，魯弗敢與，故齊伐魯，竟迎季姬。
季姬嬖，齊復歸魯侵地。

translations.text: 一百九十九年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百二年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百三年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 鮑子與悼公有郤，不善。
四年，吳、魯伐齊南方。
鮑子弒悼公，赴于吳。
吳王夫差哭於軍門外三日，將從海入討齊。
齊人敗之，吳師乃去。
晉趙鞅伐齊，至賴而去。
齊人共立悼公子壬，是為簡公。

translations.text: 二百四年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百五年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百六年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百七年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百八年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百九年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百十年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 簡公四年春，初，簡公與父陽生俱在魯也，監止有寵焉。
及即位，使為政。
田成子憚之，驟顧於朝。
御鞅言簡公曰：「田、監不可并也，君其擇焉。」
弗聽。
子我夕，田逆殺人，逢之，遂捕以入。
田氏方睦，使囚病而遺守囚者酒，醉而殺守者，得亡。
子我盟諸田於陳宗。
初，田豹欲為子我臣，使公孫言豹，豹有喪而止。
後卒以為臣，幸於子我。
子我謂曰：「吾盡逐田氏而立女，可乎？」
對曰：「我遠田氏矣。
且其違者不過數人，何盡逐焉！」
遂告田氏。
子行曰：「彼得君，弗先，必禍子。」
子行舍於公宮。

translations.text: 二百十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百十二年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百十三年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百十四年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百十五年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百十六年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百十七年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百十八年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百十九年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百二十年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百二十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百二十二年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百二十三年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百二十四年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百二十五年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百二十六年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 夏五月壬申，成子兄弟四乘如公。
子我在幄，出迎之，遂入，閉門。
宦者御之，子行殺宦者。
公與婦人飲酒於檀臺，成子遷諸寢。
公執戈將擊之，太史子餘曰：「非不利也，將除害也。」
成子出舍于庫，聞公猶怒，將出，曰：「何所無君！」
子行拔劍曰：「需，事之賊也。
誰非田宗？
所不殺子者有如田宗。」
乃止。
子我歸，屬徒攻闈與大門，皆弗勝，乃出。
田氏追之。
豐丘人執子我以告，殺之郭關。
成子將殺大陸子方，田逆請而免之。
以公命取車於道，出雍門。
田豹與之車，弗受，曰：「逆為余請，豹與余車，余有私焉。
事子我而有私於其讎，何以見魯、衛之士？」

translations.text: 二百二十七年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百二十八年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百二十九年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百三十年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百三十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百三十二年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百三十三年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百三十四年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百三十五年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百三十六年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百三十七年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百三十八年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百三十九年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百四十年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百四十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百四十二年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百四十三年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 庚辰，田常執簡公于俆州。
公曰：「余蚤從御鞅言，不及此。」
甲午，田常弒簡公于俆州。
田常乃立簡公弟驁，是為平公。
平公即位，田常相之，專齊之政，割齊安平以東為田氏封邑。

translations.text: 二百四十五年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百四十六年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百四十七年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百四十八年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百四十九年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 平公八年，越滅吳。
二十五年卒，子宣公積立。

translations.text: 二百五十年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百五十一年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 宣公五十一年卒，子康公貸立。
田會反廩丘。
康公二年，韓、魏、趙始列為諸侯。
十九年，田常曾孫田和始為諸侯，遷康公海濱。

translations.text: 二百五十二年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百五十三年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百五十四年，齊伐魯，取卞。 二百五十五年，齊伐魯，取卞。

sentences.zh: 二十六年，康公卒，呂氏遂絕其祀。
田氏卒有齊國，為齊威王，彊於天下。

translations.text: Tian clan finally had Qi state, became Qi Wei Wang, strong in the world.
二百五十六年，齊伐魯，取卞。 Tian clan finally had Qi state, became Qi Wei Wang, strong in the world.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：吾適齊，自泰山屬之瑯邪，北被于海，膏壤二千里，其民闊達多匿知，其天性也。

translations.text: Grand Historian says: I went to Qi, from Tai Shan to Langya, north covered by sea, fertile land two thousand li, its people broad-minded many concealed knowledge, their heavenly nature.

sentences.zh: 以太公之聖，建國本，桓公之盛，修善政，以為諸侯會盟，稱伯，不亦宜乎？

translations.text: With Tai Gong's sageliness, established country foundation, Huan Gong's flourishing, repaired good government, made feudal lords assembled allied, called hegemon, not also proper?

sentences.zh: 洋洋哉，固大國之風也！

translations.text: Vast, solid great country's wind!

Grand Historian says: I went to Qi, from Tai Shan to Langya, north covered by sea, fertile land two thousand li, its people broad-minded many concealed knowledge, their heavenly nature. With Tai Gong's sageliness, established country foundation, Huan Gong's flourishing, repaired good government, made feudal lords assembled allied, called hegemon, not also proper? Vast, solid great country's wind!
